security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill that provides guidance on creating Agent Skills. It contains no executable code, no network calls, no file system access beyond its own directory, and no environment variable access. The skill is purely instructional content.

content.value_statement: Building custom AI skills is complex and error-prone. This guide provides step-by-step instructions to create validated, well-structured Agent Skills that work reliably with Claude Code.
actual_capabilities: Guides creation of SKILL.md files with proper YAML frontmatter
Provides validation rules for skill names and descriptions
Includes directory structure templates for multi-file skills
Contains best practices for skill design and activation
limitations: Cannot create skills automatically - requires manual implementation
Does not validate YAML syntax - user must ensure correctness
Limited to Claude Code platform - not compatible with other AI tools

best_practices: Keep skills focused on one specific capability rather than trying to solve everything
Include specific trigger words and file extensions in descriptions to ensure proper activation
Test skills with real queries before sharing with teammates
anti_patterns: Creating overly broad skills that try to handle multiple unrelated tasks
Using generic descriptions that don't include specific activation triggers
Skipping validation steps before deploying skills to production

faq.question: Where should I save my skills?
faq.answer: Personal skills go in ~/.claude/skills/, while project-specific skills go in .claude/skills/ within your project directory.

faq.question: Why isn't my skill activating?
faq.answer: Make your description more specific with trigger words, file types, and user phrases. Include 'Use when...' clauses with common queries.

faq.question: Can I restrict what tools my skill uses?
faq.answer: Yes, add 'allowed-tools: Tool1, Tool2' to your YAML frontmatter to limit tool access for security or scope control.

faq.question: How do I test my skill?
faq.answer: Restart Claude Code and ask questions that match your description exactly. Use --debug flag if issues persist.

faq.question: What's the maximum description length?
faq.answer: Descriptions must be under 1024 characters and include both what the skill does and when to use it.

faq.question: Can skills include executable code?
faq.answer: Yes, skills can reference scripts in subdirectories and include bash commands in instructions, following security best practices.
